title: Nearest Neighbors Classification
description: In this lab, we will be using the Nearest Neighbors Classification algorithm to classify data points in a 2-dimensional space. We will be using the Iris dataset, which is a commonly used dataset in machine learning. We will visualize the decision boundaries for each class and observe how the algorithm performs when different weights are used.

meta.title: Nearest Neighbors Classification for Iris Dataset
meta.description: Explore the Nearest Neighbors Classification algorithm and visualize decision boundaries on the Iris dataset.
meta.keywords: machine learning, nearest neighbors, classification, data visualization, scikit-learn, scikit-learn playground, iris dataset
